dublin_core.dcvalue: The study presents the findings of longitudinal observations of the changes in the parameters of simple auditory motor response in children users of mobile communication The obtained results indicate the multivariability of possible effects of radiation from mobile phones on the auditory system of children
Radiatsionnaia biologiia, radioecologiia / RossiÄ­skaia akademiia nauk
[Changes in the parameters of the simple auditory-motor response in children users of mobile communication: longitudinal study].
